00043 #include "light.h"
00044 #include "scenemanager.h"
00045 #include <Ogre.h>

00047 namespace phys
00048 {
00049     Light::Light(const String& Name, SceneManager* manager)
00050     {
00051         Manager = manager;
00052         OgreLight = Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createLight(Name);
00053         SetElementType(Attachable::Light);
00054     }
00055 
00056     Light::Light(Ogre::Light* light, SceneManager* manager)
00057     {
00058         OgreLight = light;
00059         Manager = manager;
00060         SetElementType(Attachable::Light);
00061     }
00062 
00063     Light::~Light()
00064     {
00065         Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroyLight(OgreLight);
00066     }
00067 
00068     ConstString& Light::GetName()
00069     {
00070         return OgreLight->getName();
00071     }
00072 
00073     void Light::SetType(Light::LightType Type)
00074     {
00075         Ogre::Light::LightTypes OgreType;
00076         switch (Type)
00077         {
00078             case Light::Point:
00079                 OgreType = Ogre::Light::LT_POINT;
00080                 break;
00081             case Light::Directional:
00082                 OgreType = Ogre::Light::LT_DIRECTIONAL;
00083                 break;
00084             case Light::Spotlight:
00085                 OgreType = Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT;
00086                 break;
00087             default:
00088                 return;
00089         }
00090         OgreLight->setType(OgreType);
00091     }
00092 
00093     void Light::SetPosition(Vector3 Position)
00094     {
00095         OgreLight->setPosition(Position.GetOgreVector3());
00096     }
00097 
00098     void Light::SetDirection(Vector3 Direction)
00099     {
00100         OgreLight->setDirection(Direction.GetOgreVector3());
00101     }

00124     {
00125         OgreLight->setAttenuation(Range, Constant, Linear, Quadratic);

00128     void Light::SetSpotlightRange(Real InnerAngle, Real OuterAngle, Real Falloff)
00129     {
00130         Ogre::Radian IAngle(InnerAngle);
00131         Ogre::Radian OAngle(OuterAngle);
00132         OgreLight->setSpotlightRange(IAngle, OAngle, Falloff);
00133     }
00134 
00135     void Light::SetSpotlightInnerAngle(Real InnerAngle)
00136     {
00137         Ogre::Radian IAngle(InnerAngle);
00138         OgreLight->setSpotlightInnerAngle(IAngle);
00139     }
00140 
00141     void Light::SetSpotlightOuterAngle(Real OuterAngle)
00142     {
00143         Ogre::Radian OAngle(OuterAngle);
00144         OgreLight->setSpotlightOuterAngle(OAngle);
00145     }
00146 
00147     void Light::SetSpotlightFalloff(Real Falloff)
00148     {
00149         OgreLight->setSpotlightFalloff(Falloff);
00150     }

00152     void Light::SetPowerScale(Real Power)
00153     {
00154         OgreLight->setPowerScale(Power);
00155     }

00157     Light::LightType Light::GetType()
00158     {
00159         Ogre::Light::LightTypes OgreType = OgreLight->getType();
00160         Light::LightType PhysType;
00161         switch (OgreType)
00162         {
00163             case Ogre::Light::LT_POINT:
00164                 PhysType = Light::Point;
00165                 break;
00166             case Ogre::Light::LT_DIRECTIONAL:
00167                 PhysType = Light::Directional;
00168                 break;
00169             case Ogre::Light::LT_SPOTLIGHT:
00170                 PhysType = Light::Spotlight;
00171                 break;
00172             default:
00173                 return Light::Point;
00174         }
00175         return PhysType;
00176     }
00177 
00178     Vector3 Light::GetPosition()
00179     {
00180         Vector3 Pos(OgreLight->getPosition());
00181         return Pos;
00182     }
00183 
00184     Vector3 Light::GetDirection()
00185     {
00186         Vector3 Dir(OgreLight->getDirection());
00187         return Dir;
00188     }
